CustomField.formula: IF( Address1__c <> null && Address2__c <> null && Address3__c <> null && Address4__c <> null, Address1__c + " " + Address2__c + " " + Address3__c + " " + Address4__c + ", " + City__c + ", " + State__c + " " + Zip_Postal_Code__c, IF( Address1__c <> null && Address2__c <> null && Address3__c <> null && Address4__c = null, Address1__c + " " + Address2__c + " " + Address3__c + ", " + City__c + ", " + State__c + " " + Zip_Postal_Code__c, IF( Address1__c <> null && Address2__c <> null && Address3__c = null && Address4__c = null, Address1__c + " " + Address2__c + ", " + City__c + ", " + State__c + " " + Zip_Postal_Code__c, IF( Address1__c <> null && Address2__c = null && Address3__c = null && Address4__c = null, Address1__c + ", " + City__c + ", " + State__c + " " + Zip_Postal_Code__c, IF( Address1__c <> null && Address2__c = null && Address3__c <> null && Address4__c = null, Address1__c + " " + Address3__c + ", " + City__c + ", " + State__c + " " + Zip_Postal_Code__c, null)))))
CustomField.label: Shipping Address
